definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: So Boaz took Ruth and she became his wife.
sentences.chinese: 于是，波阿斯娶了路得为妻，与她同房。

sentences.english: Boaz and Ruth were the great-grandparents of king David.
sentences.chinese: 而波阿斯与路得，便是大卫王的曾祖父母。

sentences.english: And she happened to come to the part of the field belonging to Boaz, who was of the family of Elimelech.
sentences.chinese: 他恰巧到了以利米勒本族的人波阿斯那块田里。

sentences.english: Therefore the kinsman said unto Boaz, Buy it for thee.
sentences.chinese: 那人对波阿斯说，你自己买吧。

sentences.english: What kinds of grace did Boas show to Ruth?
sentences.chinese: 波阿斯对路淂表现出那些恩典？

sentences.english: Happily for Boaz, the man did not want to marry Ruth.
sentences.chinese: 让波阿斯高兴的是，这个人不想娶鲁思。

sentences.english: As soon as the unknown relative's decision was known Boaz spoke up.
sentences.chinese: 当那位至亲作出决定之后，便轮到波阿斯发言。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
